body_html: Or better, it's inference mode only so you should run with volatile=True Variable flag. This will be faster and will consume less memory. Also, if your images are of the same size you might want to consider using torch.backends.cudnn.benchmark = True
body_text: Or better, it's inference mode only so you should run with volatile=True Variable flag. This will be faster and will consume less memory. Also, if your images are of the same size you might want to consider using torch.backends.cudnn.benchmark = True
body: Or better, it's inference mode only so you should run with `volatile=True` `Variable` flag. This will be faster and will consume less memory. Also, if your images are of the same size you might want to consider using `torch.backends.cudnn.benchmark = True`
